item.title: Quadcopters - A Hitchhiker's Guide to the Sky
item.description:
We have liftoff!

Cue me trying to not get my fingers cut off

The quadcopter has been built! I had some problems during the building process, so this is a guide which will hopefully make things easier for people to start off with making their own quadcopters.

I suggest going …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija

item.title: Quadcopters - The Beginning!
item.description: I've been gravitating more towards working on electronics projects. It's a nice change from pecking the keyboard all day and it has plenty of interesting challenges of its own. The biggest difference I found is that you just can't take your hardware working correctly for granted. Things break and catch …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija
